text:
Charlotte is buying 12 apples at 6p each. She pays with a £5 note.

How much change does she get?

Karen is buying some fabric that costs £4.80 per metre.

How much would 5 m of this fabric cost?

Four children collect animal stickers. Mazana has 120 stickers, Louis has 140 stickers, Nadia has 90 stickers and Connor has 50 stickers.

What is the mean number of stickers owned by the four children?
Which number has been put in the wrong place in this sorting diagram?

Mr Chen is knitting a jumper. It takes him two and a half minutes to knit each row.
He starts knitting at 4:15 pm.

At what time will he have knitted 50 rows?

Look at the shape below.

Which one of the following shapes has the same area?
options: a) A triangle, base 10 m, height 4 m.
b) A rectangle, width 4 m, length 5 m.
c) A square, side length 5 m.
d) A parallelogram, base 7 m, vertical height 3 m.
e) A parallelogram, base 5 m, vertical height 5 m.

text: If the shapes below were not coloured, which one would have the most lines of symmetry?

___ ÷ 1000 = 0.2543

What number is missing from the calculation above?

Jenna has made this shape out of blocks.

Which of the shapes below is identical to Jenna’s shape?
